```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(forcats)
library(lubridate)

prices = read.csv("prices.csv")
securities = read.csv("securities.csv")
fund = read.csv("fundamentals.csv")
psa = read.csv("prices-split-adjusted.csv")


# Ticker symbols of telecommunications companies
TeleSymbol = securities[securities$GICS.Sector == 
                          "Telecommunications Services", "Ticker.symbol"]

# Time series for each company


T_data = telecoms %>%  filter(symbol == "T") %>% mutate(Date = ymd(date))

ggplot(data = T_data , aes(x = Date, y = close)) + geom_line()

CTL_data = telecoms %>%  filter(symbol == "CTL") %>% mutate(Date = ymd(date))

ggplot(data = CTL_data , aes(x = Date, y = close)) + geom_line()

FTR_data = telecoms %>%  filter(symbol == "FTR") %>% mutate(Date = ymd(date))

ggplot(data = FTR_data , aes(x = Date, y = close)) + geom_line()

LVLT_data = telecoms %>%  filter(symbol == "LVLT") %>% mutate(Date = ymd(date))

ggplot(data = LVLT_data , aes(x = Date, y = close)) + geom_line()

VZ_data = telecoms %>%  filter(symbol == "VZ") %>% mutate(Date = ymd(date))

ggplot(data = VZ_data , aes(x = Date, y = close)) + geom_line()

telecoms = psa %>% filter(psa$symbol == "T" |psa$symbol == "CTL" | psa$symbol =="FTR"| psa$symbol == "LVLT"| psa$symbol == "VZ") %>% mutate(Date = ymd(date))

ggplot(data = telecoms , aes(x = Date, y = close, group = symbol )) + geom_line(aes(color = symbol))


print("hello")
```
